name: Harapan Yang Pulih
description:
Hope must be owned by every human being, from the young to the old. Everyone's expectations are different. However, there is always something in common which is good hope. Hope can not always be realized, there are times when you meet failure. At this moment we are given two choices to get back up or give up. 
I always hoped that my path was fine, but I ended up failing. The sadness is unstoppable, I always believe there will be a better way if I wake up. So now the hope that I have has recovered and I am trying to make it happen.
